attributes.action: Do not arm militants in Syria from Tax payer money
attributes.additional_details:
In a time where our government is demanding that we collectively tighten our belts, placing cuts on the country in order to eradicate our deficit, we cannot then be expected to pay to intervene in Syria's domestic affairs.

This country cannot and must not be expected to police the world.  That America continues on this trend, is no reason for us to blindly follow!!

There is stronger evidence that terrorist groups are supporting the 'rebels' than the use of chemical weapons by the established government in that country....is this country going to make the same mistake we did when we armed Saddam Hussein and then Osama Bin Laden...it is our money, not yours to spend, and we do not want to spend it on other peoples wars!!!
